summary: 3+ years experience in software development. Skilled in Python, Javascript, Software Development, Machine Learning, Software Testing and Debugging. Experienced in rapid prototyping using open-source software. Familiar with Cloud Application Development. Enjoy solving problems by coding.

description: Assist in testing AI models so that products can be launched on schedule.
Fix DB issues and improve overall database performance.
Building a testing environment for the existing project and applying it to the CI stage.
Optimize the existing CI process, add lint and testing to improve the quality of the code.
Developed and maintained web crawler using Scrapy.
Visualized proxy usage and crawler stability by Prometheus and Grafana.
Improved the recommendation system performance of the e-commerce client, increased the click-through rate and conversion rate by about 200%.
Improved the search engine performance of the e-commerce client and reduced search errors by more than 40%.
Developed and maintained data collecting tools using ReactJS and MongoDB.
Building recommendation system using Python and TensorFlow.
Building machine learning training pipeline using Airflow.
Visualized model performance using Google Data Studio.

projects.name: E-commerce Recommendation System
projects.description: We built a recommendation system for one of the top 3 e-commerce websites in Taiwan. The system uses Fluentd and ElasticSearch to collect real time log of user behavior. The data will be extracted, transformed and trained the Deep Learning recommendation engine automatically using Airflow. In order to deal with the massive loading of e-commerce websites, we use Kubernetes and Docker to deploy and auto-scale the server. Our system has increased the click-through rate and conversion rate by about 200%.

projects.name: E-commerce Search Engine
projects.description: We built an e-commerce search engine using ElasticSearch and Bert Deep Learning model. Our Engine reduces errors by more than 40%.
